note:
I am a useless eater, originally from Alberta, now living in Toronto. I have taken to writing brilliant blog posts calling for things to start being run better. I want an end to capitalism and
pathocracy , and Adults put in Charge of things.

Needless to say, I have a hard time getting this through the filters. You can help by reading my Mastodons and my blog at https://adultsincharge.blog/

BTW, I registered on Mastodon three years ago, But I only started doing it seriously this month.
